function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Highly infective disease with a range of symptoms, including respiratory failure or death","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems, increased mortality rates","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control measures, develop effective treatments and vaccines, and promote public health education and awareness","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring, and digital communication tools","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, elderly, and those with underlying health conditions","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, governments, and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Need to triage and treat large numbers of patients with respiratory illness","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems, delay in treatment, increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Expand healthcare capacity, implement telemedicine for triage, and deploy rapid testing and diagnosis technologies","Technologies":"Telemedicine, rapid testing and diagnosis tools, healthcare capacity planning tools","People":"Patients with respiratory illness, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, governments, and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Need to protect the healthcare workforce to ensure they are able to treat the sick","Impact":"Increased risk of infection among healthcare workers, reduced healthcare capacity, and increased burden on remaining workforce","Mitigation":"Provide personal protective equipment (PPE), implement infection control protocols, and prioritize vaccination for healthcare workers","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring, and digital communication tools","People":"Healthcare workers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, governments, and public health agencies"}]}
